ComicInfo.Title: No Smoking; The Return of Big Foot; Madballs Meet Weirdbeard the Pirate; Finders, Keepers; Color Crazy; The Legend of Lake Nish; The Spectacular Comic Book Caper!
ComicInfo.Summary:
No Smoking: Heathcliff gets fed up with people who don't obey posted notices.
The Return of Big Foot: Iggy and Heathcliff go on a nature hike, but they are worried about rumors of Big Foot. They find a old man in the woods who calls himself that, and has been lost in the woods for decades.
Madballs Meet Weirdbeard the Pirate: The Madballs are captured by Captain Weirdbeard and his pirate crew.
Finders, Keepers: Heathcliff is playing hide and seek with the kids, and they track his various hiding places, where he has caused chaos.
Color Crazy: Animal steals Miss Piggy's magic crayon and runs around changing the colors of everything.
The Legend of Lake Nish: Grandpa and Heathcliff go fishing in Lake Nish, but the monster in the lake causes lots of trouble, which Grandpa blames on Heathcliff because the monster manages to stay out of Grandpa's sight.
The Spectacular Comic Book Caper!: Top Dog and Joey help out Mark Carter (the dad of Joey's friend Danny) who owns a comic book store, when a loan shark wants to burn down the store for insurance money. Mark's friend Jim, who plays Spider-Man at store appearances, also gets involved.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
